Description: Excellent playing and cosmetic condition, with little to no cosmetic blemishes from use. Other than a few faint scratches on the body, and some scratches on the pick guard from normal playing the guitar is in near perfect condition. Electronics are in perfect working order, neck is nice and straight, and fretwear is next to non-existent. Gibson USA Burstbucker pickups, 1960's slim taper D-profile neck, 24.75" scale length. Comes with Gibson padded case. Please refer to photos, and if You have any questions feel free to ask.
